_header: I saw a fair maiden sitten and sing
_description: Cradle song of the Virgin Mary — five couplets and burden: ‘Lullay myn lykyng my dere sone myn swetyng / Lullay my dere herte myn owyn dere derlyng’

BLSl2593.First Lines:
I saw a fayr maydyn syttyn & syngeSche lullyd a lytyl chyld a
                    swete lordyng…
BLSl2593.Last Lines:
…Prey we now to that chyld & to his moder dereGrawnt hem
                    his blyssyng that now makyn chere
